document_data.name: Rockbottom
document_data.mainbody: '''Rockbottom''' was a [[dwarf]] cleric. He was part of an expedition that accompanied the [[Companions of the Hall]] to [[Shallows]] in [[1370 DR]], only to be attacked by [[orc]]s and [[frost giant]]s, and did what he could to heal [[Withegroo Seian'Doo]] and [[Bruenor Battlehammer]].{{cite book/The Thousand Orcs/MMP|329}}
